title: How to Send a Long Video from iPhone

steps.title: Open Dropbox on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Dropbox on your iPhone or iPad. It’s the blue icon with a white open box inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen.

steps.title: Add the video to Dropbox.
steps.content: Add the video to Dropbox. If the video is already in your Dropbox, you can skip this step. If not: [1] X Research source Tap + Create at the bottom-center part of the screen. Tap Upload photos . Navigate to the folder that contains the video. Tap the video to select it. Tap Next . Select a Dropbox folder in which you’ll save the video. Tap Upload . This can take several moments if the video is really long.

steps.title: Tap the video you want to send.
steps.content: Tap the video you want to send. If you’re not already inside the folder where the video is stored, tap the folder to open it, then tap the video.

steps.title: Tap the Share icon.
steps.content: Tap the Share icon. It’s the blue outline of a person and a + symbol at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Enter the recipient’s email address.
steps.content: Enter the recipient’s email address. To start typing, tap the “To:” field to spring open the keyboard.

steps.title: Tap Send.
steps.content: Tap Send . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. This sends an email containing a link to the video. The recipient can then click or tap the link to view it in Dropbox.
